## MultiStageTimer.(constructor)

Defines the `MultiStageTimer` with a list of timer names that represent its stages.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(statistics: Statistics, name: string, stages: string[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  statistics | [Statistics](./harp-mapview.statistics.md) | The statistics object that manages the timers. |
|  name | string | Name of this <code>MultiStageTimer</code>. |
|  stages | string\[\] | List of timer names. |
